name: TheVillagesDailySunSportsPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Villages Daily Sun Sports Podcast provides extended coverage of the sports news you receive from the print edition of The Villages Daily Sun newspaper in The Villages, FL. 

New episodes are added each Wednesday.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move The Villages Daily Sun Sports Podcast to the top of your news brief!
